entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
